speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report by Jean-Pierre Audy on behalf of the Committee on Budgetary Control on the European Investment Bank’s annual report for 2006 ( 2007/2251(INI) ) ( A6-0079/2008 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Jean-Pierre Audy on behalf of the Committee on Budgetary Control on the European Investment Bank’s annual report for 2006 ( 2007/2251(INI) ) ( A6-0079/2008 ).
